verses.verse: (Prayer to God in Time of Trouble) (1 Sam 24.15; Ps 5.6; 26.1) Vindicate me, O God, and defend my cause against an ungodly people; from those who are deceitful and unjust, deliver me!
(Ps 18.1; 42.9; 44.9) For you are the God in whom I take refuge; why have you cast me off? Why must I walk about mournfully because of the oppression of the enemy?
(Ps 36.9; 42.4; 84.1) O send out your light and your truth; let them lead me; let them bring me to your holy hill and to your dwelling.
(Ps 26.6; 33.2) Then I will go to the altar of God, to God my exceeding joy, and I will praise you with the harp, O God, my God.
(Ps 42.5, 11) Why are you cast down, O my soul, and why are you disquieted within me? Hope in God, for I shall again praise him, my help and my God.
